Crimes.Crime_Name: Marriage fraud under Immigration and Refugee Protection Act
Crimes.Legal_Issue: Credibility assessment and evidence analysis in marriage genuineness determination
Crimes.Procedural_Context: Appeal of visa officer's refusal of sponsorship application
Crimes.Credibility_Assessment: Board found applicants' explanations lacking credibility
Crimes.Legal_Provision: Immigration and Refugee Protection Regulations, Regulation 4
Crimes.Basis_of_Claim: Marriage not genuine or entered for immigration benefits
Crimes.Key_Factor_in_Determination: Lack of credibility in explanations and focus on immigration benefits
Crimes.Evidence_Ignored: No significant evidence ignored; corroborating evidence considered but not persuasive
Crimes.Legal_Standard: Marriage must be genuine and not primarily for immigration purposes
Crimes.Authority: Immigration and Refugee Protection Act and Regulations
Crimes.Decision_Review_Issue: Unreasonable credibility assessment and improper evidence analysis
Crimes.Governing_Rule_or_Provision: Regulation 4 – Marriage not genuine or for immigration benefit
Crimes.Cause_of_Refusal: Suspected marriage fraud and lack of genuineness
Crimes.Legal_Provision_Cited: Section 4 of the Immigration and Refugee Protection Regulations
Crimes.Evidentiary_Issues: Discrepancies in applications and lack of proof of marital consummation
Crimes.Procedural_Fairness: Process followed standard appeal and review procedures
Crimes.Legal_Defense_or_Challenge: Challenged Board’s credibility assessment and use of regulations
Crimes.Relevant_Law: Immigration and Refugee Protection Act and Regulations
Crimes.Procedural_Issue: Application of new regulations and review standards

Crimes.Crime_Name: Misrepresentation under Immigration and Refugee Protection Act
Crimes.Legal_Issue: Credibility assessment and evidence analysis regarding marriage authenticity
Crimes.Procedural_Context: Appeal of visa officer's refusal based on misrepresentation concerns
Crimes.Credibility_Assessment: Explanations for discrepancies and non-consummation found lacking
Crimes.Legal_Provision: Section 4 of the Immigration and Refugee Protection Regulations
Crimes.Basis_of_Claim: Marriage entered primarily for immigration status
Crimes.Key_Factor_in_Determination: Focus on immigration in communications and inconsistent statements
Crimes.Assessment_Standard: Reasonableness of factual findings and credibility
Crimes.Evidence_Ignored: No indication that relevant evidence was ignored
Crimes.Legal_Standard: Marriage must be genuine, not primarily for immigration benefit
Crimes.Application_Factor: Emails emphasizing immigration benefits and prior inconsistencies
Crimes.Decision_Review_Issue: Alleged unreasonable credibility assessment and misapplication of law
Crimes.Governing_Rule_or_Provision: Section 4 – Spouse definition and genuineness requirement
Crimes.Cause_of_Refusal: Concerns about marriage authenticity and potential misrepresentation
Crimes.Legal_Provision_Cited: Section 4 of the Immigration and Refugee Protection Regulations
Crimes.Evidentiary_Issues: Inconsistencies in statements and emphasis on immigration over marital life
Crimes.Legal_Defense_or_Challenge: Challenge to Board’s credibility findings and regulatory interpretation
Crimes.Relevant_Law: Immigration and Refugee Protection Act and Regulations
Crimes.Procedural_Issue: Use of updated regulations and standard of review

Crimes.Legal_Issue: Credibility of applicants and authenticity of marriage in visa context
Crimes.Procedural_Context: Judicial review of IAD decision on visa application refusal
Crimes.Credibility_Assessment: Explanations for discrepancies and non-consummation deemed insufficient
Crimes.Legal_Provision: Regulation 4 of the Immigration and Refugee Protection Regulations
Crimes.Basis_of_Claim: Marriage not genuine; false information provided in application
Crimes.Key_Factor_in_Determination: Prior false statements and immigration-centered communications
Crimes.Review_Outcome: Decision upheld; no serious question for certification
Crimes.Assessment_Standard: Reasonableness of decision based on evidence
Crimes.Legal_Standard: Marriage must be genuine and not for immigration advantage
Crimes.Application_Factor: History of misrepresentation and email content
Crimes.Decision_Review_Issue: Credibility assessment and evidentiary analysis by Board
Crimes.Governing_Rule_or_Provision: Regulation 4 – Genuineness of marriage and spousal status
Crimes.Cause_of_Refusal: Marriage genuineness concerns and prior false information
Crimes.Evidentiary_Issues: Discrepancies in applications and lack of shared life evidence
Crimes.Procedural_Fairness: Fair hearing provided through appeal process
Crimes.Document_Fraud: Alleged false representations in visa documents
Crimes.Credibility_Issues: Doubt cast on truthfulness of explanations
Crimes.Legal_Defense_or_Challenge: Challenge to credibility findings and use of evidence
Crimes.Relevant_Law: Immigration and Refugee Protection Act and Regulations
Crimes.Procedural_Issue: Standard of review and admissibility of evidence
